title: Love Bites
description: Oh, to have that dizzying beautiful feeling of love at first sight!There are many reasons why this happens to us...some right and some well, need a little more time to figure out.However, occasionally, outside interference can destroy what is meant to jealousy, miscommunication, secrets, and fear of being hurt...the list goes on.Enjoy ten short stories of love at first sight and how the potential couples managed to persevere.
author: Deborah McClatchey
